channel.title: opencv on Sebastian Korotkiewicz - Tech{{log}}
channel.description: Recent content in opencv on Sebastian Korotkiewicz - Tech{{log}}

item.title: Compile and run OpenCV code from the command line
item.description: For OpenCV 2.4.x cd /path/to/opencv/samples/c/ For OpenCV 3 cd /path/to/opencv/samples/cpp/ Compile g++ -ggdb `pkg-config --cflags --libs opencv` facedetect.cpp -o facedetect run ./facedetect
